title: Aeroelasticity
description: Structural dynamics of one-dimensional systems. Analysis of static aeroelastic phenomena, unsteady aerodynamics, and flutter.  Equations of motion for complete aeroelastic systems; solution techniques.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: AE 3125 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and AE 3515 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
